import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { BsEyeFill } from "react-icons/bs"; const Cards = ({ movies }) => { return (
{movies.title}

{movies.overview.slice(0, 110)}...

{/*
{movies.title}

{movies.overview}

Fecha de lanzamiento:

{movies.release_date}

*/} ); }; export default Cards;
